name: Basic Cost of Living
description:
The basic monthly cost of living for the artist, based on his current situation: renting a 412 sqft 1br apartment in downtown Denver, storage for art studio, food, insurance, clothing. The price takes into consideration platform fees, crypto to fiat conversion rate and associated fees, transfer fees and taxes. Does not reflect unforeseen medical expenses, cost of maintaining a creative practice, or other factors yet to be actualized.

Edition size calculated based on the number of months remaining in the artist's life assuming the average life expectancy of a male US citizen (80).
